resources.string: Add security to your device to use this application
Can not use application as Device is not secured by biometric or credential
"\nSecret Vault securely stores your private information using industry-standard encryption. Your secrets remain encrypted at all times and can only be viewed after biometric authentication.\n "
AES encryption is used to securely protect all stored secrets.
Encrypted data is stored locally using Room database.
Your decryption key is stored inside AndroidKeyStore hardware, the most secure place on your device.
Only your biometric authentication can unlock your secret information.
Your secrets never leave your device.
No secret data is logged, tracked, or sent to servers.
Even after authentication, your decrypted data is never stored, logged, or shared by Secret Vault.
You control what you store and when you delete it.
